pkgmetadata.longdescription: Kingsoft Office is an office productivity suite by Kingsoft. This software is of alpha quality, and may be unstable at times. Use at own risk.

use.flag: Use CN version of WPS Office (including WPS Cloud, WPS account login and other functions)
Use mime files provided by WPS
Use bundled dbus that depends on sys-apps/systemd
Use standalone sys-libs/libsystemd package to provide libsystemd.so for working non-systemd systems.
